verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H7121"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w restored|strong="H2421"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w*, “\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*; \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1121"\w* wherever \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H1004"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w decreed|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* seven-year \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* already \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w had|strong="H6430"\w* \w proceeded|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* man \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God \w had|strong="H6430"\w* \w instructed|strong="H1697"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w lived|strong="H1481"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1481"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

\w At|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, she \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w appeal|strong="H6817"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w relate|strong="H5608"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w things|strong="H1419"\w* Elisha \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w telling|strong="H5608"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w how|strong="H2009"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w back|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w*. \w Just|strong="H2088"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w revived|strong="H2421"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w appeal|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* said, “\w My|strong="H5921"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w* \w restored|strong="H2421"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* woman, \w she|strong="H5704"\w* confirmed \w it|strong="H5414"\w*. \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w officer|strong="H5631"\w*, saying, “\w Restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* hers, \w along|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* proceeds \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w she|strong="H5704"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*.” Hazael Murders Ben-hadad

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H5704"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* \w while|strong="H5704"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5704"\w* man \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God \w has|strong="H4428"\w* come \w here|strong="H2008"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gift|strong="H4503"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, ‘\w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w illness|strong="H2483"\w*?’”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w*, \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gift|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* forty \w camel|strong="H1581"\w* \w loads|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \w thing|strong="H2088"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aram \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w ask|strong="H4428"\w*, ‘\w Will|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w illness|strong="H2483"\w*?’”

\w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w* answered, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w*.’ \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \f + \fr 8:10 \ft Or ‘You will surely not recover.’ And the LORD\f* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w shown|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* fact \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w Elisha|strong="H5704"\w* \w fixed|strong="H5975"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w gaze|strong="H6440"\w* \w steadily|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H7760"\w* became uncomfortable. \w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God began \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*.

“\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* lord \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w*?” \w asked|strong="H7971"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w*. “\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*,” Elisha replied. “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H7971"\w* fire \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w fortresses|strong="H4013"\w*, \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w dash|strong="H7376"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w little|strong="H5768"\w* \w ones|strong="H5768"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7376"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w rip|strong="H1234"\w* \w open|strong="H1234"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w pregnant|strong="H2030"\w* \w women|strong="H2030"\w*.”

“\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w could|strong="H2088"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mere \w dog|strong="H3611"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* monstrous \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*?” \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Elisha \w answered|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w shown|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* Aram.”

So Hazael left \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H2421"\w* master, \w who|strong="H4100"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w him|strong="H2421"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w* say \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w*?” \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H3212"\w* replied, “\w He|strong="H3212"\w* told \w me|strong="H2421"\w* \w that|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w would|strong="H2421"\w* \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w next|strong="H4283"\w* \w day|strong="H4283"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thick \w cloth|strong="H4346"\w*, \w dipped|strong="H2881"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*’s \w face|strong="H6440"\w*. \w So|strong="H3947"\w* Ben-hadad \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*. Jehoram Reigns in Judah (2 Chronicles 21:1–7)

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3092"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2568"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3092"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahab \w over|strong="H4427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w succeeded|strong="H4427"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H8141"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

Jehoram \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirty-two|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H8147"\w* \w became|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8147"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* Jehoram \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ahab \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* married \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ahab \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w unwilling|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w since|strong="H3117"\w* \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w promised|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* maintain \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w forever|strong="H3605"\w*. Edom and Libnah Rebel (2 Chronicles 21:8–11)

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Jehoram,\f + \fr 8:20 \ft Literally In his days\f* Edom \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4427"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H3027"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* Jehoram \f + \fr 8:21 \ft Hebrew Joram, a variant of Jehoram (the son of Jehoshaphat), as in verse 16; also in verses 23, and 24\f* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Zair|strong="H6811"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Edomites \w surrounded|strong="H5437"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5221"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*. \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w*, however, \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* homes.

\w So|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* Edom \w has|strong="H3063"\w* \w been|strong="H6586"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w rebellion|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
